item.title: [delta] how to fix my tradelock command
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

[quote=“himskater2, post:1, topic:354583”]heres the commands

if (command.startsWith("tradelock") && playerRights >= 1) {
	PlayerHandler.canTrade = false;
			sM("You have tradelocked The user successfully");
                }

if (command.startsWith("untradelock") && playerRights >= 1) {
	PlayerHandler.canTrade = true;
			sM("You have untradelocked The user successfully");
}

when ever I use the tradelock command it says it works but it doesnt tradelock them. does anyone know how to fix?[/quote]

This probably is working on yourself and not others, try stringing your victim .

Read full topic

if (command.startsWith("tradelock") && playerRights >= 1) {
	PlayerHandler.canTrade = false;
			sM("You have tradelocked The user successfully");
                }

if (command.startsWith("untradelock") && playerRights >= 1) {
